numerics.internal.integrals

Unsigned integer functions

License:
.

Authors:
Răzvan Ștefănescu

Source:


pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool ispow2(const uint x);
returns true if x is a power of 2

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool ispow2(const ulong x);
returns true if x is a power of 2

pure nothrow @nogc @safe auto clz(const uint x);
counts leading zeros

pure nothrow @nogc @safe auto clz(const ulong x);
counts leading zeros

pure nothrow @nogc @safe auto ctz(const uint x);
counts trailing zeros in a int

pure nothrow @nogc @safe auto ctz(const ulong x);
counts trailing zeros in a long
